member.name: F:Nano.Web.Enums.XXssProtectionPolicyBlockMode.Disabled
member.summary: Disabled. Specifies that the X-Xss-Protection header should not be set in the HTTP response.

member.name: F:Nano.Web.Enums.XXssProtectionPolicyBlockMode.FilterDisabled
member.summary: Filter Disabled. Specifies that the X-Xss-Protection header should be set in the HTTP response, explicitly disabling the IE XSS filter.

member.name: F:Nano.Web.Enums.XXssProtectionPolicyBlockMode.FilterEnabled
member.summary: Filter Enabled. Specifies that the X-Xss-Protection header should be set in the HTTP response, explicitly enabling the IE XSS filter.

member.name: F:Nano.Web.Enums.XXssProtectionPolicyBlockMode.FilterEnabledBlockMode
member.summary: Filter Enabled Block Mode. Specifies that the X-Xss-Protection header should be set in the HTTP response, explicitly enabling the IE XSS filter. BlockMode is set to true.

member.summary: Robots. Settings for robots (search engines) behavior.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirective.IsNone
member.summary: Is None. Adds the 'none' source. All other sources are ignored.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirective.Sources
member.summary: Sources. Adds the array of custom sources.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectiveSandbox.AllowForms
member.summary: Allow Forms. Allows the page to submit forms. If this keyword is not used, this operation is not allowed.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectiveSandbox.AllowModals
member.summary: Allow Modals. Allows the page to open modal windows.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectiveSandbox.AllowOrientationLock
member.summary: Allow Orientation Lock. Allows the page to disable the ability to lock the screen orientation.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectiveSandbox.AllowPointerLock
member.summary: Allow Pointer Lock. Allows the page to use the Pointer Lock API.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectiveSandbox.AllowPopups
member.summary: Allow Popups. Allows popups (like from window.open, target= "_blank", showModalDialog). If this keyword is not used, that functionality will silently fail.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectiveSandbox.AllowPopupsToEscapeSandbox
member.summary: Allow Popups To Escape Sandbox. Allows a sandboxed document to open new windows without forcing the sandboxing flags upon them. This will allow, for example, a third-party advertisement to be safely sandboxed without forcing the same restrictions upon a landing page.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectiveSandbox.AllowPresentation
member.summary: Allow Presentation. Allows embedders to have control over whether an iframe can start a presentation session.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectiveSandbox.AllowSameOrigin
member.summary: Allow Same Origin. Allows the content to be treated as being from its normal origin. If this keyword is not used, the embedded content is treated as being from a unique origin.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectiveSandbox.AllowScripts
member.summary: Allow Scripts. Allows the page to run scripts (but not create pop-up windows). If this keyword is not used, this operation is not allowed.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectiveSandbox.AllowTopNavigation
member.summary: Allow Top Navigation. Allows the page to navigate (load) content to the top-level browsing context. If this keyword is not used, this operation is not allowed.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.Accelerometer
member.summary: Accelerometer. Controls whether the current document is allowed to gather information about the acceleration of the device through the Accelerometer interface.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.AmbientLightSensor
member.summary: Ambient Light Sensor. Controls whether the current document is allowed to gather information about the amount of light in the environment around the device through the AmbientLightSensor interface.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.AutoPlay
member.summary: Auto Play. Controls whether the current document is allowed to autoplay media requested through the HTMLMediaElement interface. When this policy is disabled and there were no user gestures, the Promise returned by HTMLMediaElement.play() will reject with a DOMException. The autoplay attribute on audio and video elements will be ignored.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.Battery
member.summary: Battery. Controls whether the use of the Battery Status API is allowed. When this policy is disabled, the Promise returned by Navigator.getBattery() will reject with a NotAllowedError DOMException.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.Camera
member.summary: Camera. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use video input devices. When this policy is disabled, the Promise returned by getUserMedia() will reject with a NotAllowedError DOMException.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.DisplayCapture
member.summary: Display Capture. Controls whether or not the current document is permitted to use the getDisplayMedia() method to capture screen contents. When this policy is disabled, the promise returned by getDisplayMedia() will reject with a NotAllowedError if permission is not obtained to capture the display's contents.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.DocumentDomain
member.summary: Document Domain. Controls whether the current document is allowed to set document.domain. When this policy is disabled, attempting to set document.domain will fail and cause a SecurityError DOMException to be thrown.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.EncryptedMedia
member.summary: Encrypted Media. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use the Encrypted Media Extensions API (EME). When this policy is disabled, the Promise returned by Navigator.requestMediaKeySystemAccess() will reject with a DOMException.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.ExecutionWhileNotRendered
member.summary: Execution While Not Rendered. Controls whether tasks should execute in frames while they're not being rendered (e.g. if an iframe is hidden or display: none).

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.ExecutionWhileOutOfViewport
member.summary: Execution While Out Of Viewport. Controls whether tasks should execute in frames while they're outside of the visible viewport.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.FullScreen
member.summary: FullScreen. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use Element.requestFullScreen(). When this policy is disabled, the returned Promise rejects with a TypeError.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.Gamepad
member.summary: Gamepad. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use the Gamepad API. When this policy is disabled, calls to Navigator.getGamepads() will throw a SecurityError DOMException, and the gamepadconnected and gamepaddisconnected events will not fire.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.Geolocation
member.summary: Geo location. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use the Geolocation Interface. When this policy is disabled, calls to getCurrentPosition() and watchPosition() will cause those functions' callbacks to be invoked with a GeolocationPositionError code of PERMISSION_DENIED.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.Gyroscope
member.summary: Gyroscope. Controls whether the current document is allowed to gather information about the orientation of the device through the Gyroscope interface.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.LayoutAnimations
member.summary: Layout Animations. Controls whether the current document is allowed to show layout animations.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.LegacyImageFormats
member.summary: Legacy Image Formats. Controls whether the current document is allowed to display images in legacy formats.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.Magnetometer
member.summary: Magnetometer. Controls whether the current document is allowed to gather information about the orientation of the device through the Magnetometer interface.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.Microphone
member.summary: Microphone. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use audio input devices. When this policy is disabled, the Promise returned by MediaDevices.getUserMedia() will reject with a NotAllowedError.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.Midi
member.summary: Midi. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use the Web MIDI API. When this policy is disabled, the Promise returned by Navigator.requestMIDIAccess() will reject with a DOMException.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.NavigationOverride
member.summary: Navigation Override. Controls the availability of mechanisms that enables the page author to take control over the behavior of spatial navigation, or to cancel it outright.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.OversizedImages
member.summary: Oversized Images. Controls whether the current document is allowed to download and display large images.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.Payment
member.summary: Payment. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use the Payment Request API. When this policy is enabled, the PaymentRequest() constructor will throw a SecurityError DOMException.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.PictureInPicture
member.summary: Picture In Picture. Controls whether the current document is allowed to play a video in a Picture-in-Picture mode via the corresponding API.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.PublicKeyCredentialsGet
member.summary: Public Key Credentials Get. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use the Web Authentication API to retrieve already stored public-key credentials, i.e. via navigator.credentials.get({publicKey: ..., ...}).

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.SpeakerSelection
member.summary: Speaker Selection. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use the Audio Output Devices API to list and select speakers.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.SyncXhr
member.summary: Sync Xhr. Controls whether the current document is allowed to make synchronous XMLHttpRequest requests.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.UnoptimizedImages
member.summary: Unoptimized Images. Controls whether the current document is allowed to download and display unoptimized images.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.UnsizedMedia
member.summary: Unsized Media. Controls whether the current document is allowed to change the size of media elements after the initial layout is complete.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.Usb
member.summary: Usb. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use the WebUSB API

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.ScreenWakeLock
member.summary: Screen Wake Lock. Controls whether the current document is allowed to use Screen Wake Lock API to indicate that device should not turn off or dim the screen.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.WebShare
member.summary: Web Share. Controls whether or not the current document is allowed to use the Navigator.share() of Web Share API to share text, links, images, and other content to arbitrary destinations of user's choice, e.g. mobile apps.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.XrSpatialTracking
member.summary: Xr Spatial Tracking. Controls whether or not the current document is allowed to use the WebXR Device API to interact with a WebXR session.

member.name: T:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicyAmbientLightSensor
member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Ambient Light Sensor

member.name: T:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicyDisplayCapture
member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Display Capture.

member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Document Domain.

member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Encrypted Media.

member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Execution While Not Rendered.

member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Execution While Out Of Viewport.

member.name: T:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicyGeolocation
member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Geo location.

member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Layout Animations.

member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Legacy Image Formats.

member.name: T:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicyNavigationOverride
member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Navigation Override.

member.name: T:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicyOversizedImages
member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Oversized Images.

member.name: T:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicyPublicKeyCredentialsGet
member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Public Key Credentials Get.

member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Sync Xhr.

member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Unoptimized Images.

member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Unsized Media.

member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Screen Wake Lock.

member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Web Share.

member.name: T:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CspOptions.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicy.CspDirectivePermissionsPolicyXrSpatialTracking
member.summary: Csp Directive Permissions Policy Xr Spatial Tracking.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.HstsOptions.IsEnabled
member.summary: Is Enabled. Enables Hsts (Strict transport security) policies.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.HstsOptions.UsePreload
member.summary: Use Preload. Adds the preload directive, defaults to false. Max-age must be at least 18 weeks, and includeSubdomains must be enabled to use the preload directive.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.HstsOptions.IncludeSubdomains
member.summary: Include Subdomains. Adds includeSubDomains in the header, defaults to false

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.CacheOptions.IsEnabled
member.summary: Is Enabled. Enables Hsts (Strict transport security) policies.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.RobotOptions.UseNoIndex
member.summary: Use No Index. Instructs search engines to not index the page

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.RobotOptions.UseNoFollow
member.summary: Use No Follow Instructs search engines to not follow links on the page

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.RobotOptions.UseNoSnippet
member.summary: Use No Snippet. Instructs search engines to not display a snippet for the page in search results

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.RobotOptions.UseNoArchive
member.summary: Use No Archive. Instructs search engines to not offer a cached version of the page in search results

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.RobotOptions.UseNoOdp
member.summary: Use No ODP. Instructs search engines to not use information from the Open Directory Project for the page’s title or snippet

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.RobotOptions.UseNoTranslate
member.summary: Use No Translate - Instructs search engines to not offer translation of the page in search results (Google only)

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.RobotOptions.UseNoImageIndex
member.summary: Use No Image Index. Instructs search engines to not index images on the page (Google only)

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.HealthCheckOptions.EvaluationInterval
member.summary: Evaluation Interval. The interval between health-checks.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.HealthCheckOptions.FailureNotificationInterval
member.summary: Failure Notification Timout. The minimum number of secoends betweeen failure notificaitons.

member.name: P:Nano.Web.WebOptions.HostingOptions.HealthCheckOptions.MaximumHistoryEntriesPerEndpoint
member.summary: Maximum History Entries Per Endpoint. The maximum number of historical entries per endpoint in the UI database.
